messagev2: The original setup guide contains typo (about GitLab bot's permissions).  The GitLab repo setup and the API server setup are mixed together.  You may see [my repo setup walkthrogh](https://vincenttam.gitlab.io/post/2018-09-16-staticman-powered-gitlab-pages/1/) and [my custom API config](https://vincenttam.gitlab.io/post/2018-09-16-staticman-powered-gitlab-pages/2/) to know more.
